transcript.text:
￼


























Important Configurations
Live Chat Integration

5 min
customers will spend more time at your store if it has a superior customer service system thus, to interact with customers live chat has become an important and integral part of any business this helps you get real time and prompt responses from the customers live chat integration will give your onprintshop web stores’ customers a timely response and encourage them to complete the purchase to enable live chat feature into your web store follow the below steps 1 go to chat service provider 1 go to chat service provider to enable live chat service in your website then reach out to any of the live chat service providers they offer different pricing plans and services check if their offerings meet your requirements some examples of live chat service providers are provide support liveperson comm100 genesys kayako alive5 zendesk 2 get the code from chat service provider 2 get the code from chat service provider after registration, the live chat service provider will give you a code to install the live chat functionality into your website copy and save securely the code 3 configuration into admin panel 3 configuration into admin panel to enable the live chat function, you will require pasting the code in admin panel on the admin panel navigate to the admin > external service settings > ‘social sharing’ tab > google services > ‘action’ menu > ‘edit’ option under the settings, sections find the ‘common footer script code’ text block paste the saved code from the live chat service provider this will enable the live chat services on your website in case of query please contact the onprintshop support team at support\@onprintshop com
Did this page help you?
